refsynopsisdiv.title: Synopsis
refsynopsisdiv.para: The content model parameter entities provide marked sections around groups of related elements. You can selectively include or remove these elements from DocBook by changing these parameter entities.

refentry.refsect1:
Description
The following sections identify all of the content model parameter entities in DocBook.
FIXME: This is probably a DTD typo. This should be the sidebar.content.module parameter entity, surely?
&parament.cmodel.gen;
